items.title: ‘Priced for Perfection’: Tariffs Loom Over Richly Valued Stocks
items.description: (Bloomberg) -- The conventional wisdom on Wall Street appears to be that the US stock market’s latest march to records has been unabated because, when it comes to tariff threats, President Donald Trump talks loudly but carries a small stick.Most Read from BloombergWhy the Federal Reserve’s Building Renovation Costs $2.5 BillionMilan Corruption Probe Casts Shadow Over Property BoomMumbai Facelift Is Inspired by 200-Year-Old New York BlueprintHow San Jose’s Mayor Is Working to Build an AI CapitalY

items.title: Dollar Rethink Is Pushing Emerging World to Sell More Euro Debt
items.description: (Bloomberg) -- Emerging-market borrowers are tapping the euro bond market at the fastest pace in over a decade, capitalizing on the rising demand for diversification away from the US dollar. items.title: "As Bitcoin Surpasses $123,000, ABQuant Users' Daily Earnings Rise to $12,900"
items.author: Na
items.description: Bitcoin experienced significant growth between 2020-2023, transitioning from a speculative investment to a mainstream financial asset. Major investors and institutions are increasingly embracing cryptocurrencies, with platforms like AB Quant offering accessible digital asset investment strategies.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: Publicly embracing cryptocurrencies, signaling institutional confidence in digital assets
